    • toFraction

      public Fraction toFraction()
      Converts the MixedFraction to an improper fraction in the form:

      wholeNumber numerator/denominator = numerator/denominator.

      Formula:

      numerator = (whole number * denominator) + numerator

      Returns:
      improper from Fraction of MixedFraction

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Concatenates the attributes of MixedFraction to String. String form:

      wholeNumber numerator/denominator

      This method was made by ROXAS, Johan Rickardo - 2233375
      Overrides:
      toString in class Fraction
      Returns:
      mixed number

    • toDouble

      public double toDouble()
      Converts MixedFraction to decimal.

      The whole number is set as it is. The numerator is divided by the denominator. The whole number is added to the quotient of the numerator and denominator.

      Overrides:
      toDouble in class Fraction
      Returns:
      MixedFraction as decimal

      public MixedFraction add(MixedFraction addend)
      Adds the MixedFraction addend to the MixedFraction addend. MixedFraction1 and MixedFraction2 are converted to improper fractions. Invokes the Override add method from Fraction class.
